MAIN_MESSAGE: There is power cut in the G72 postcode area of Blantyre. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:19am. Our emergency response team are on their way to investigate a grounded overhead power line on Auchentibber Road and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:45pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:46am on Thursday, 08 April 2021
